summary: A newly married happy couple visits a sex therapist to determine why the wife can't achieve an orgasm with her husband. This causes a horrific suppressed memory to emerge and she becomes more and more distant.
cast: Craig Sheffer|Sheryl Lee|Terence Stamp|Casey Siemaszko|Spalding Gray|Leigh Taylor-Young|Lois Chiles|Blu Mankuma|Ken Camroux-Taylor|Pamela Perry|Eli Gabay|Molly Parker|Hiro Kanagawa|Merrilyn Gann|Gillian Barber|Peter Kelamis|Norman Armour|David Glyn-Jones|Quincy Welch|Carson Welch|Serena Bodnar|Kristin Lehman|Akesh Gill|Jennifer-Juniper Angeli
